comments.text:
Hey there, I bought one of these on Monday and after some playing discovered this model appears to have no support for compass. I've not been able to find any verification of this online, so I'm unsure if it's perhaps a faulty unit or simply a feature which is not supported by this model.

It makes Google Sky Maps unusable, unless in manual mode. And GPS navigation software less accurate from.

Is this something you have found with﻿ your unit also?

comments.text:
Want a FREE SKINOMI PROTECTOR for this device? (For skeptics: it's not a scam) 
Follow these 5 steps: 
1.)﻿ Look up "skinomi-forums" on Google, and click the first﻿ link that shows up
2.) Sign up for a FREE account
3.) Look under the "other" thread category, and search for the thread that has "[OFFICIAL] Acer Iconia Tab A200 Contest + Skin Design Diagrams " as the header
4.) Read the rules of the contest, and enter the contest!
5.) Follow us @skinomi on twitter and/or "like" us on facebook!
